EXT5E.AllWarnings: All warnings must be confirmed before submission is allowed.

warnings.RiskHint: After adding extended ability scores with D&D5e Extender, deactivating this module could cause serious problems. Do not add extended ability scores unless you intend to use them permanently.
warnings.MoreInfo: For more information about the risks, click here.
warnings.Deactivate: If I ever deactivate this module my world may break.
warnings.Update: I should not update the dnd5e system without first checking that this module is compatible.
